column4: can anyone tell me any assembly language compiler in ubuntu to compile and run assembly language programs.....????
well, there are no compilers for assembly ;) but I'm sure there is an assmbler available for gcc
erUSUL: actually i have just started learning assembly language, so tell me accordingly
